content:
To summarize the sales for August 2022, you would look for the row in the table that has the month value "8/1/2022". From this row, you can see that the sales for August 2022 were $7,042,031.

To compare the sales for August 2022 to the previous month, you would use the "sales\_usd\_MoM" value, which is -15.6%. This means that the sales for August 2022 were 15.6% lower than the sales for July 2022.

To compare the sales for August 2022 to the same month the previous year, you would use the "sales\_usd\_YoY" value, which is -81.2%. This means that the sales for August 2022 were 81.2% lower than the sales for August 2021.

The number of unique buyers for August 2022 can be found in the "unique\_buyers" column for the row with the month value "8/1/2022". From this row, you can see that the number of unique buyers for August 2022 was 15,369.

To compare the number of unique buyers for August 2022 to the previous month, you would use the "unique\_buyers\_MoM" value, which is -12.4%. This means that the number of unique buyers for August 2022 was 12.4% lower than the number of unique buyers for July 2022.

To compare the number of unique buyers for August 2022 to the same month the previous year, you would use the "unique\_buyers\_YoY" value, which is -73.3%. This means that the number of unique buyers for August 2022 was 73.3% lower than the number of unique buyers for August 2021.
